wikipedia_page.main: Sonia Edwards is a Welsh poet and writer who writes primarily in Welsh. She is a recipient of the Tir na n-Og Award.

response: *National Eisteddfod of Wales: Prose Medal - Sonia Edwards

Notable alumni include Oscar-winning actor Hugh Griffith and noted English novelist Gabriel Fielding, who both attended the school when it was still Llangefni County School, Hollywood actress and Oscar nominee Naomi Watts, opera tenor Gwyn Hughes Jones, and TV and radio personality Hywel Gwynfryn. Sonia Edwards who is a bi-lingual novelist teaches Welsh at the school.Sonia Edwards, Parthian books, retrieved 5 March 2015
